data.name: Larcin Lazer Demo
data.detailed_description:
Larcin Lazer is an action stealth game where your memory is put to the test. Each level is filled with traps that disappear as soon as you start moving. You have to move relying on your memory to get to the end of a course filled with lasers and other deadly dangers.

Larcin Lazer also come with:
  • Over 100 levels to challenge yourself
  • 5 worlds with different atmospheres and obstacles
  • Stylish visuals reminiscent of the 90s
  • Bonuses hidden in the levels, for players with the best memory
data.about_the_game:
Larcin Lazer is an action stealth game where your memory is put to the test. Each level is filled with traps that disappear as soon as you start moving. You have to move relying on your memory to get to the end of a course filled with lasers and other deadly dangers.

Larcin Lazer also come with:

  • Stylish visuals reminiscent of the 90s

data.short_description: The best tool for a good theft? Your memory! Observe your surroundings and remember the location of the lasers, they disappear as soon as you move. Move with style to dodge the many obstacles spread across more than 100 levels. Prepare for a MEMORABLE heist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or newer
  • Processor: 1 GHz processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: WebGL compatible graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: WebGL compatible graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
